Hello,

Sorry to intrude and for the size of this missive/file...

This list has proven to be filled with people much more fluent than I in Japanese. With this in mind, I am hoping that someone can anyone tell me if this book is available via Amazon.co.jp and, if so, what the URL may be. Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thank you for you kind assistance.

Rick
